pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"julia-二进制安装程序","children":"Julia 二进制安装程序"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Julia 是一个全新的以科学计算为核心的通用编程语言，其二进制程序可以到如下链接下载。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/bin/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["这里仅镜像 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://julialang.org/downloads/","rel":"nofollow","children":"JuliaLang Downloads"}]," 中提供的稳定发行版以及 rc 版本。每日构建的测试版 (nightlies) 以及
",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://junolab.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Juno"}],"/",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://juliacomputing.com/products/juliapro","rel":"nofollow","children":"Julia Pro"}],"等 IDE 版本不包括在内。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["尽管一些包管理工具（例如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pacman"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"conda"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"choco"}],") 中提供有 Julia，但是这些工具或多或少都存在一些由二进制
依赖导致的问题，因此官方推荐的方式是根据自己的使用平台下载相应的二进制程序，然后通过解压的方式进行手动安装。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"julia-一键安装","children":"Julia 一键安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对于习惯命令行的用户而言，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/johnnychen94/jill.py","rel":"nofollow","children":"jill.py"}]," 是一个社区维护的全平台下一键安装
Julia 的命令行工具。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["安装/更新 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill"}],"： ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pip install jill --user -U"}]," (需要 Python ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"3.6"}]," 或更新的版本)"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["安装 Julia：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install [VERSION] [--upstream UPSTREAM] [--confirm]"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install"}],"：最新的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x.y.z"}]," 版本"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install --confirm"}],"：无需交互确认直接安装"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install --upstream BFSU"}],"：从北外镜像下载并安装"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install 1.4"}],"：安装最新的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.4.z"}]," 版本"]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["查询现存的上游镜像：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill upstream"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["帮助文档：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill [COMMAND] --help"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill --help"}],"：查询存在的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill"}]," 命令"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill install --help"}],"：查询 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"install"}]," 命令的使用方式"]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["利用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"jill"}]," 安装完成后即可通过在命令行执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"julia"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"julia-1"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"julia-1.4"}]," 来启动不同版本的 Julia."]}]]}]

meta.title: Julia Releases 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
